      • GlobalConfig

        public GlobalConfig(javax.servlet.ServletContext sc,
            java.lang.String configDirectory)
        Constructor (can be used for Servlets). Initializes the object und reads the configuration data from the specified directory.
        Parameters:
        servletContext - object of the corresponding ServletContext
        configDirectory - absolute or relative Path (e.g. 'web-inf/conf') to the configuration directory. If 'null', the default directory will be used.
